name: Mariana Trench
description:
Mariana Trench is an educational platform game. Tells the story of a hero named Bioblast.

Controls:

Arrows (left and right) for movements and Space to jump!

Rules:

Collect organic waste and avoid inorganic waste.

There are lots of traps, so watch out!

---------------------------------------------------------------

Please let me known what you think about MARIANA TRENCH through the comments below.
